title: Thank You For The Impact On My Life
description:
Emily shares how her mom was terrible at choosing men until she found Dr. Laura and they started listening together ...  - Dr. Laura: "I make decisions based on fact, not feelings."

Share your moment of inspiration!! Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
